Title: Whittaker Our Way Out
Plot: Fellow con-man James Whittaker Wright III enlists the help of the Hustle crew to avenge his legendary grifter grandfather's treatment by Cornfoots Merchant Bank. Posing as enterpreneurs and investors they try to get back at the bank by a massive con. But have the Hustle crew forgotten just how devious James Whittaker Wright III can be?
GuestStars: Natasha Estelle Williams, David Phelan, Clemency Burton-Hill, Cordelia Bugeja, Tom Keller, Ashley Powell, Stephen Campbell Moore, Terence Harvey, Richard Chamberlain
